item.source: How to add a custom item

item.title: How to add a custom item
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“bobbie1990, post:4, topic:285766”][quote author=ModAssassin link=topic=377929.msg2843553#msg2843553 date=1246128729]

Hello i found a model maker and i made a cusom item but where i add the code?

this is a example:

if(i == 3324){ //~yellow h’ween mask~
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
//Purple: 926-127
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = yellow;
class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 900;
class8.anInt190 = 400;
class8.anInt198 = 1850;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 3188;
class8.anInt200 = 255;
class8.anInt175 = 255;
class8.anInt197 = 100;
class8.aString170 = “yellow h’ween mask”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “cool mask”.getBytes();
}

you add that in the class8.java of you’re client - do you have the gzip and .rar file for the models folder of you’re client. also, once you added that in you’re class8.java, go into the item.java of you’re source, look for “Full Helm” and put the item id in somewhere.

first…

get that, go into class8.java and go to the very end of all of the other items. after the “}” paste that into it, than add the item ID in item.java, don’t forget to compile you’re client, and restart you’re source. hope this helps
[/quote]
when i use it, it comes up as a weapon… ;S why? and how i change it?[/quote]
add it in item4.java…

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a custom item

Read full topic

item.title: How to add a custom item
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“ModAssassin, post:3, topic:285766”][quote author=bobbie1990 link=topic=377929.msg2843549#msg2843549 date=1246128416]
Hello i found a model maker and i made a cusom item but where i add the code?

this is a example:

if(i == 3324){ //~yellow h’ween mask~
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
//Purple: 926-127
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = yellow;
class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 900;
class8.anInt190 = 400;
class8.anInt198 = 1850;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 3188;
class8.anInt200 = 255;
class8.anInt175 = 255;
class8.anInt197 = 100;
class8.aString170 = “yellow h’ween mask”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “cool mask”.getBytes();
}
[/quote]

you add that in the class8.java of you’re client - do you have the gzip and .rar file for the models folder of you’re client. also, once you added that in you’re class8.java, go into the item.java of you’re source, look for “Full Helm” and put the item id in somewhere.

first…

get that, go into class8.java and go to the very end of all of the other items. after the “}” paste that into it, than add the item ID in item.java, don’t forget to compile you’re client, and restart you’re source. hope this helps :)[/quote]
when i use it, it comes up as a weapon… ;S why? and how i change it?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a custom item

item.title: How to add a custom item
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“bobbie1990, post:1, topic:285766”]Hello i found a model maker and i made a cusom item but where i add the code?

this is a example:

if(i == 3324){ //~yellow h’ween mask~
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
//Purple: 926-127
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = yellow;
class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 900;
class8.anInt190 = 400;
class8.anInt198 = 1850;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 3188;
class8.anInt200 = 255;
class8.anInt175 = 255;
class8.anInt197 = 100;
class8.aString170 = “yellow h’ween mask”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “cool mask”.getBytes();
}[/quote]

you add that in the class8.java of you’re client - do you have the gzip and .rar file for the models folder of you’re client. also, once you added that in you’re class8.java, go into the item.java of you’re source, look for “Full Helm” and put the item id in somewhere.

first…

get that, go into class8.java and go to the very end of all of the other items. after the “}” paste that into it, than add the item ID in item.java, don’t forget to compile you’re client, and restart you’re source. hope this helps

Read full topic

if(i == 3324){ //~yellow h’ween mask~

class8.anInt175 = 255;

class8.aByteArray178 = “cool mask”.getBytes();
